meanings.definition: A flat area of ground near a building, typically paved and used for outdoor dining or relaxation.
meanings.sent1: We sat on the terrace and enjoyed our lunch in the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had a lovely terrace overlooking the river.
meanings.sent3: The birds on the terrace were eyeing our sandwiches with great interest.
meanings.sent4: The terrace of tables stretched out like a welcoming path.
meanings.sent5: The terrace was a peaceful spot to unwind after a long day.

meanings.definition: A series of connected terraces or platforms on a hillside for cultivation or recreation.
meanings.sent1: The farmers planted crops on each terrace of the hill.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization built terraces to grow their crops on the steep slopes.
meanings.sent3: The goats on the terraces seemed to be playing a game of follow the leader.
meanings.sent4: The terraces cascaded down the hill like a giant staircase.
meanings.sent5: The terraces provided a stunning view of the valley below.
